name: The fruit fly, Drosophila melanogaster, as a microrobotics platform
description: This is associated data to the PNAS manuscript titled: The fruit fly, Drosophila melanogaster, as a microrobotics platform. Authors: Kenichi Iwasaki, Charles Neuhauser, Chris Stokes, Aleksandr Rayshubskiy Summary of data: * Trajectories of 11 experiments where flies were guided to 'write' HELLO WORLD in the zip file: hello_world_single_fly.zip Contents of this folder are the following: 5_05_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_02_try2\ 5_06_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_03\ 5_08_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_05\ 5_12_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_08\ 5_15_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_09\ 5_18_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_12\ 5_19_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_13\ 5_20_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_14\ 5_21_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_15\ newprojector_on_newrig_singlefly_HelloWorld_BerlinK_07_07_23\ newprojector_on_newrig_singlefly_HelloWorld_BerlinK_07_11_23_03\ These datafiles contain the running trajectories of a single fly, as well as metadata that signals beginning and end of letter writing trials. Summary of analysis folders: sum_analysis\ summary_figs\
citeAs: @data{DVN/ARIURR_2025,author = {Iwasaki, Kenichi and Neuhauser, Charles and Stokes, Chris and Rayshubskiy, Aleksandr},publisher = {Harvard Dataverse},title = {The fruit fly, Drosophila melanogaster, as a microrobotics platform},year = {2025},url = {https://doi.org/10.7910/DVN/ARIURR}}

distribution.name: hello_world_single_fly.zip
distribution.description:
Contents of this folder are the following: 

	5_05_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_02_try2\
	5_06_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_03\
	5_08_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_05\
	5_12_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_08\
	5_15_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_09\
	5_18_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_12\
	5_19_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_13\
	5_20_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_14\
	5_21_23_BerlinK_HelloWorld_15\
	newprojector_on_newrig_singlefly_HelloWorld_BerlinK_07_07_23\
	newprojector_on_newrig_singlefly_HelloWorld_BerlinK_07_11_23_03\

	These datafiles contain the running trajectories of a single fly, as well as metadata that signals beginning and end of letter writing trials.
	
	Summary of analysis folders:
	sum_analysis\
    	summary_figs\
